title: coated gurnard with sweetcorn and tomato relish and jalapeño mayonnaise
description: Gurnard is not a strongly flavoured fish, so here it’s served with a punchy mayo, fresh relish and an extra-crunchy coating.
ingredients: 1 Dutch green chilli, seeds in and finely chopped
1 tbsp coriander, chopped (save a few pretty bits for the finished dish)
1 fresh corn on the cob, cooked and kernels removed
40g/1½oz chopped jalapeño pepper, from a jar
